response.job_title: Environmental and Process Scientist | PhD Student TBI
response.summary:
🌟 Passionate about Environement and Process Engineering | Renewable Energy and Water Treatment | Lifelong Learner 🌱

Greetings! I'm a third-year PhD candidate at INSA Toulouse, specializing in Process Engineering and Environment. With a strong focus on seawater desalination powered by solar energy, I'm deeply committed to contributing to sustainable solutions for our global water and energy challenges.

Highlights:

- Currently immersed in cutting-edge research on seawater desalination using renewable energy sources.
- Proficient in process simulation, particularly in the context of renewable energies and water treatment.
- Eager to translate my academic insights into real-world applications, applying my knowledge from both international experiences in Colombia and France.

🌍 Beyond academia, I believe in the power of interdisciplinary teamwork to tackle complex issues, and I'm excited to engage with professionals who share a passion for sustainable innovation.

Let's connect! Whether you're interested in water treatment, renewable energy, process engineering, or simply want to exchange ideas, feel free to reach out. Together, we can make a positive impact on our environment and society.
response.skills: Capacidad de análisis, Microsoft Office, Dedicada, Gestión de proyectos, Gestión de tiempo

company.name: TBI - Toulouse Biotechnology Institute, Bio & Chemical Engineering
company.description:
Toulouse Biotechnology Institute (TBI ex LISBP), Bio&Chemical Engineering, situé sur le campus de l’Institut National des Sciences Appliquées de Toulouse (INSA) associe recherche fondamentale et appliquée en biotechnologies et procédés. Multi-tutelles (INSA, CNRS, INRAE), croisant excellence scientifique avec pertinence économique et sociétale, le laboratoire d’un effectif de plus de 320 personnes met en synergie des compétences multi et interdisciplinaires en Sciences du Vivant et
Sciences de l’Ingénieur. Par les fronts de sciences que l’unité aborde et ses résultats d’un excellent niveau, TBI est un leader national, acteur majeur européen du développement de la Bioéconomie durable, associant un important réseau de collaborateurs publics et privés, nationaux et internationaux.
